title: Bloom Into You: Regarding Saeki Sayaka, Vol. 1
description: A light novel spin-off for the hit yuri manga and anime series Bloom Into You!Saeki Sayaka has always been an old soulâ€”serious and reserved, preferring to focus on her studies rather than make friends.
